FrcstCustmzAdjustment.name: FrcstCustmzAdjustment
FrcstCustmzAdjustment.description: Represents an individual forecast manager’s adjustment of a subordinate’s consumption forecast.

AdjustedAmount.description: The revenue amount of an individual forecast item, after an adjustment.

AdjustedQuantity.description: The quantity amount of an individual forecast item, after an adjustment.

AdjustmentNote.description: A text note providing information about the adjustment. The maximum length is 255 characters.

ForecastingCustomCategoryId.description: The ID of the forecasting custom category.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the related forecasting type.

IsAmount.description: If true, then the adjustment is made in a revenue amount. If false, IsQuantity must be set to true.

IsQuantity.description: If true, the adjustment is made in a quantity amount. If false, IsAmount must be set to true.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the forecast owner.
